lines.text: 30, it's really after 10; / Looks like Lulu's been repairing it again. / Though you're wild as any Zulu, / And you're just as hard to tame, / Little Lulu, I love you-lu just the same, the same, / Little Lulu, I love you-lu just the same. #
Hey, Lulu! Hey, Lulu, come on. We're gonna have a game.
Come on, put 'er here, ol' boy, ol' boy, ol' boy, ol' boy!
